name: Terminal Turmoil (Nolski)
description:
This is a 4 player local stealth multiplayer game where up to 3 trackers work together to find 1 hacker. The hacker's goal is to blend in with the crowd to hack 4 out of 7 of the terminals before the time runs out before being eliminated by the trackers. The trackers will have to use audio and visual cues to eliminate the hacker before the time runs out.

This game was made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam at the LIU Post site.

Lead Programmer - Jon Mendez

Lead Artist/Audio - Nolan Sadowski

**THIS IS A VERY EARLY BUILD. THIS WILL BE IMPROVED **
